text: @WHO @WHOWPRO @pahowho @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @DrTedros How about blocking restaurants operating in hospitals from using 3rd party delivery apps to deliver food throughout metropolitan areas.  Yes, this almost did happen to me.  A sandwich from a 24 hr chain located next to the ER of a hospital. Seems reasonable... 😕
